system.description: When you rally your family's strength for a major undertaking, roll +Grasp.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your forces are reluctant or unprepared. Take 1 Sleepers and the GM will tell you what goes wrong.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You mobilize your forces, but choose one: take 1 Sleepers from the effort, the mobilization takes longer than expected, or your forces are only partially committed.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your forces mobilize effectively. You have the resources and people you need for your undertaking.
